snippet.title: Link Twin - Global Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Link Twin is an exciting and stylistic puzzle game with fresh mechanics, visually stunning art and a haunting soundtrack.

Take control of the mysterious Tom and Lily who share an unbreakable connection.
Guide them through a world of mysterious landscapes and mind-bending puzzles and discover the secret behind their bond.

-------------------------------

Go to http://www.link-twin.com/ for more info.

-------------------------------

Download from:

***Galaxy Apps*** - http://www.samsungapps.com/appquery/appDetail.as?appId=com.lorraine.linktwinHD_sapps
***App Store*** - http://appstore.com/linktwin/
***Google Play*** - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lorraine.linktwin_goo
